ref: 3354 *kulla3 ʻ pot ʼ. [kulija -- n. ʻ a partic. vessel ʼ Kauś., ʻ a measure ʼ Pāṇ., kulharī -- , ˚rikā -- f. ʻ pot ʼ Bhpr.: prob. with kúlāla -- and other ʻ pot ʼ words s. v. kuṭa -- 1 ← Drav.]
Pk. kullaḍa -- n. ʻ small vessel, fireplace ʼ, kulluḍiā -- f. ʻ pitcher ʼ, kullūria -- , kullaria -- m. ʻ sweetmaker ʼ, ˚riyā -- f. ʻ his shop ʼ;
G. kulṛī, kullī f. ʻ earthen pot, scrotum ʼ.
